ielts.name: Achieving Band 7 in IELTS
ielts.description: On February 26, 2022, I took the IELTS exam. The result was remarkable (Band 7) as it exceeded my expectations. This achievement boosted my confidence in pursuing international education opportunities.

ielts.name: My IELTS Journey
ielts.description: A 6-month self-study journey combining online resources, mock tests, and daily speaking practice to improve fluency, writing coherence, and listening skills. Consistency was the key to achieving success.

web_frontend.name: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
web_frontend.description: Completed the FreeCodeCamp JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures certification, mastering core JS concepts, problem-solving, and ES6+ syntax.

web_frontend.name: Responsive Web Design
web_frontend.description: Gained skills in modern responsive design principles, CSS Grid, Flexbox, and accessibility-focused layouts.

web_frontend.name: Frontend Development Bootcamp - Mohirdev
web_frontend.description: Comprehensive program covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Built multiple projects including interactive UIs and responsive designs.

web_backend.name: Node.js & Express Backend Development
web_backend.description: Hands-on training in REST APIs, authentication, middleware, and connecting with MongoDB and MySQL.

web_backend.name: API Design and Development
web_backend.description: Focused on building scalable and secure APIs using Express.js and industry best practices.

MU.name: Best Male Student of the Year - Millat Umidi University
MU.description: Awarded for academic excellence, leadership in extracurricular activities, and contribution to student community.

MU.name: 50% Merit-Based Scholarship
MU.description: Received a 50% tuition fee waiver for outstanding academic performance and achievements during the admission process.

UDEA.name: Fully Funded Scholarship at UDEA
UDEA.description: Selected for a fully funded scholarship program at Universidad de Antioquia, recognizing academic merit and research potential.

masters.name: Masters Plan
masters.description: Currently preparing for a Master's degree in Software Engineering abroad, with target universities in Italy, Germany, and the USA.
